Dialogue.Value: #b@false#・・・,#b@true#Alright! I got away!
#b@false#・・・,#b@true#No! I can’t get away!
This looks annoying.,Should we try to run?
Alice isn’t here...,I wonder if I should run away?
No， Alice!,I can’t turn my back to,the enemy right now!
Tch!,This isn’t a fight,I can run from!
Send the selected,chips to your Navi!
Won’t send any chips this,turn， and any unused chips,from last turn will carry over!
Permanently increase,choosable chips by the number,of chips currently selected!
Increase the number of,chips to choose from，,but only for one turn!
Shanghai!,Wait a turn for me to ,send you more chips!
If Alice were here,you could ADD，but...
Null element doesn’t have any,special abilities，but it doesn’t,have any weak points either.
Double Buster power.,Charge is a punch attack that,pushes back 2 panels!
Increased movement speed.,Deflect attacks with swords.,Charge chips to step ahead!
More chips in custom screen.,Can select up to 6 chips.,Charge inflicts statuses.
On switch，cross-shape terrain.,Charge shot changes to terrain.,Super Armor; Strong Stance.
Fly to ignore terrain and wind.,Press A with no chips to,perform evasive maneuver.
Status immunity; reduced,weaknesses. Elem chips +10,power; Same Elem +20 power.
Ah....,This feels familiar.
Fufu....,Have you forgotten already?
It’s okay.,I’ll go over it again in detail.
First，Alice needs to send you,chip data to fight the viruses.
On the left is the Custom,Screen，where you can pick,chips.
The chips we can choose are,these icons under the picture，,right?
Correct. You can choose,chips from here.
The details of the chip you,have your cursor on are,shown here.
Its attack power is right here.
Normally，you can only send,one chip per turn，but....
Oh，right!,I remember this one!
I can send chips with the,same name together，like,these RayGuns!
You can use any chips you,send that turn to stay on the,attack.
I got most of it.,I’ll leave the rest up to,my fighting instincts.
Okay，I’ll pick some chip data,and send it to you.
Put your cursor on a chip，,press the A Button，and then,hit OK.
If you make a mistake，,you can go back with the,B Button.
You can check chip,descriptions with the,R Button.
You can also try to run away,with the L Button，but now’s,not the time for that.
Huh?,Is that a chip with no,attack power?
That’s not an attack chip.,It’s a support chip.
For example，AreaGrab steals,the enemy’s area so you have,more room to move.
Using AreaGrab with sword,chips is a simple yet effective,strategy.
Um.... Those chips have,different names.,How can I use them both?
Fufu....,Good question.
Look here!
These chips have letter,codes，like how a poker,deck has numbers.
If the chips have the same,code，then you can send,them together.
Oh yeah! That’s right!
Both AreaGrab and Sword,are L-coded，so you can,send them together.
By the way，isn’t there an,＊ (asterisk) code too?
Looks like you’ve been,studying!
It’s like a wild card that can,be sent with any other code.
You can send chip codes like,A＊A because of this.
Okay，now I remember.,It’s based on choosing the,same code together.
Now then，give it a shot!
Whew! I was worried，,but it all worked out!,So，what’s this button?
That’s the ADD Button.,You can use it to open,your folder.
Open my folder?,What do you mean?
It’s a new feature，so I,wouldn’t expect you to,know much about it.
The FolderAdd system,adds more chips to the,Custom Screen.
Really? It sure would be,easier to strategize if we had,more chips to choose from.
It’d make finding a specific,chip a lot easier too.
There are two ways to open,the folder，so I’ll explain them,both.
After you’ve picked your chips，,press ADD to open the folder.
The chips are discarded,and can’t be used，but....
Instead，you’ll add that number,of chips to the Custom Screen,each turn.
So if we ADD 2 chips，then,we’ll have 7 to choose from,each turn?
That’s right.
You can also ADD without,picking any chips.
You’ll get 5 more chips to,choose from next turn.
Hm? So I don’t have,to discard any chips?,This one is way better!
Not quite. This ADD only,increases your chip count,for one turn.
After you choose from those,chips，you go back to normal.
So in other words，it’s only,temporary.
If we’re not careful，we,might run out of chips in,a drawn-out fight....
Either way，you can’t send any,chips if you ADD that turn.
Wha!?,Then I guess we should only,ADD when necessary....
Now，since there are 3,Recov20 chips in the way，,try to ADD them!
Hey，Alice!,What’s my cute face,doing up there?
(....Cute face?)
Did you forget?,That’s the Emotion Window.
Oh，now I remember!,It shows my emotional state.
I’ll get anxious if I take too,much damage in a row.
And I’ll be happy if I delete,enemies at the same time!
And then the next chip,you use will heal you.,....Wait，why?
Who knows!
Oh，and when Alice operates,exceptionally well，I’ll enter,Full Synchro!
Just try to hit an enemy with,a chip while it’s attacking.
Right!,I’ll try to counter their attacks!
During Full Synchro，the power,of the next chip is doubled.
You should also see enemies,flash to help time counterhits.
Use that to time more,counterhits and stay in,Full Synchro!
But I’ll go back to normal,if I take a hit，so I should,be careful.
Judging by your Emotion,Window，you two must be,quite close!
It’s proof that the hearts of,a NetOp and her Navi are,connected.
....Is that true?,It doesn’t feel that way at all,to me.
Since it’s so difficult to counter,enemies，let’s practice with a,quick chip，like Knife.
I need to time my attack,to hit the Kedama while it’s,bouncing forward.
Okay! ,I’ll send the chip data!
Time for the exam!,Remember what I taught,you，and don’t hold back!
Now that I’ve sent chip data，,it’s time to bust some viruses!
Got it!,Now it’s my turn!
We’re trying to ADD now，,so don’t hit OK.
I’ll explain that later.,For now，just hit OK.
Now that I’ve sent chip data，,it’s time to bust some viruses!
Got it!,Now it’s my turn!
We’re trying to ADD now，,so don’t hit OK.
Should I explain how to move?
It’s fine.,I remember how to move,on my own.
I can go up，down，left，and,right in my red area by using,the D-Pad.
I can fire the Buster with the,B Button，even if I don’t have,any chips!
It’s weak，but I can charge it,by holding down the B Button.
Of course you’d remember,this part.
Chip data you send to,Shanghai is shown above,her head.
When you want to use a chip，,press the A Button.
You can only use a chip,once per battle，so keep,that in mind.
The number in the top-left,corner is Shanghai’s HP.
She’ll be deleted if her HP,hits 0，so please take good,care of her.
Enemies fight from the,blue area on the right.
The number near the enemy,is its HP.
Same as earlier，the virus will,be deleted when its HP hits 0.
Hold on!,What if I use all of my chips,before I can delete them!?
I can’t damage it enough,with my buster alone!
First，relax.,See the gauge at the top?
That gauge will fill as time,passes.
When it’s full，you can press,either L or R to open the,Custom Screen.
Thank you for the help!
No problem. Now，let’s,delete those viruses!
Well done.,That takes care of the viruses.
Finally，I’ll explain,Busting Rank.
Busting Rank measures,how well you fought.
You’ll find it in the Results,Screen after a fight.
Busting Rank rises when,deleting viruses quickly,or at the same time.
However，taking damage,or making unnecessary,movements will lower it.
So as long as my fights are,quick and decisive，I’ll be OK!
Busting Rank ranges from,1 to 10，with an additional,S rank at the top.
Challenge yourself to get the,best Busting Rank you can.
Shanghai?,What’s happening?,You look....
Some kind of power is,building inside me....
Ah，Dr. Morichika’s calling.
That data you installed,must have caused a,Style Change!
Navis naturally evolve,to match the habits and,quirks of their NetOps.
That’s a Style Change.
A Style Change，huh....
It’s a style change!,That form is....
Ah，Dr.Morichika is calling.
That style is called....,{0} Style!
You did it，Shanghai!,You got {0} Style!
You can change styles in,battle by pressing the up,button on the Custom Screen.
However，you can’t send,chips during that turn，so,be careful.
Also，you can always change,back to the form you,started the battle with
but other styles can,only be used once in,for a single battle.
Right now this isn’t,too useful，but it will be,as you gain styles
Use different styles and,their advantages to gain,an edge in battle!
But watch out for,Aqua and Earth attacks.,They’ll hit twice as hard.
But watch out for,Elec and Poison attacks.,They’ll hit twice as hard.
But watch out for,Leaf and Earth attacks.,They’ll hit twice as hard.
But watch out for,Heat and Poison attacks.,They’ll hit twice as hard.
But watch out for,Heat and Elec attacks.,They’ll hit twice as hard.
But watch out for,Aqua and Leaf attacks.,They’ll hit twice as hard.
Yeah! I feel the power of,pure fighting spirit!,Who knew I had it in me?
Yeah! I feel the power of,a raging tempest!,Who knew I had it in me?
Yeah! I feel the power of,a doctor’s intellect!,Who knew I had it in me?
Yeah! I feel the power of,solid ground beneath my feet!,Who knew I had it in me?
Yeah! I feel the power to,soar above the clouds!,Who knew I had it in me?
Yeah! I feel the power to,control the elements!,Who knew I had it in me?
This style fights well without ,having to rely on chips.
This style doubles your,buster power，so you can,fight using it alone.
Also，your charge shot throws,a huge Fighter Punch.
It’s an elemental punch,that pushes any enemies,in its path.
This style uses quick tactical,strikes to dispatch enemies.
This style is quite agile，,allowing you to evade,enemy attacks with ease.
Also，you can use swords,to nullify and parry enemy,attacks.
At max buster charge，you’ll,step ahead two panels when,using chips.
Also，your charge shot,slashes enemies with an ,elemental sword.
It slices three vertical tiles in,front of you with your style’s,element.
This style lets you use chips,more effectively.
You start with six chips in the,Custom Screen，and you can,ADD up to twelve.
Also，you can choose up to,six chips per turn，allowing for,more than one P.A.!
Your charge shot becomes,a syringe gun which fires,syringes.
They’ll inject the enemy with,your element’s status.
This style helps you endure,relentless assault.
This style grants you super,armor，so you won’t flinch,when you take a hit.
Starting in or switching to this,style makes two crosses of,elemental terrain.
Also，damage taken while,standing still is halved.
Furthermore，your charge,shot attacks the enemy’s feet,with an elemental quake.
This quake will stop your,enemies in their tracks.
Also，your element’s terrain,within three tiles of you will,release an additional attack!
This style specializes in,ignoring special terrain.
By flying in the air，you can,avoid the effects of special,terrain.
Also，you can’t be pushed,around by wind effects.
Once per turn，if you have no,chips left，you can press A to,make an evasive maneuver!
Also，your charge shot,becomes a fan that,summons tornadoes.
These tornadoes hit eight,times，two panels ahead.
This style improves how,you use elemental attacks.
This style manipulates the,elements，giving elemental,chips +10 power.
Chips of your style’s element,gain an extra 10 power!
When hit by your style’s,weaknesses，you won’t,take as much damage.
Also，you’re unaffected by,statuses.
Your charge shot draws a,magic circle and channels,a magical elemental flame
up to three panels ahead.
Looks like you can’t hold,any more styles....
Want to overwrite one of,your current styles?
Overwrite which style?
Are you sure? You won’t,be able to get it back.
Are you sure? You won’t,be able to get it back.
